channel.title: News Roundup on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in News Roundup on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Everything Apple Announced: iPhone Air, iPhone 17, Apple Watches, AirPods Pro 3
item.description: The iPhone 17 is here, along with a very thin iPhone Air. There are three new Apple watches to tell you how you’re feeling, and a pair of AirPods Pro 3 that can translate between languages.
